name: Faster Blaster (New_Node)
description:
Modification of the Angega Studios top down space shooter tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChv-gaPlKNROf6iMDhxIpUA

-Simple, funny and addictive!

-Random enemy ships

-A new Powerup (turbo laser)

-Difficulty increases every 1000 points!

Controls:

Simply move in horizontal the ship with the mouse.
